content: काष्ठा {@--1@} A quarter or region of the world, direction, region (दिश्) <ls>Ki. 3. 55.</ls> {@--2@} A limit, boundary; स्वयं विशीर्णद्रुमपर्णवृत्तिता परा हि काष्ठा तपसः <ls>Ku. 5. 28.</ls> {@--3@} The last limit, extremity, pitch, climax, excess; काष्ठागतस्नेहरसानुविद्धं <ls>Ku. 3. 35.</ls> {@--4@} Raceground, course. {@--5@} A mark, goal. {@--6@} The path of the wind and clouds in the atmosphere. {@--7@} A measure of time = (1/30) Kalā. {@--8@} Water. {@--9@} The sun. {@--10@} A fixed place of a lunar mansion. {@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of a wife of Kaśyapa and daughter of Dakṣa.
